parisaraya ha swabhawika sampath winasha kirima maha parimana mulya wancha walata wada dahas gunayakin wana bhayanaka aparadha nisa pasugiya shathaka kihipayaka ape rate parisarayata sidu wu haniya, wisheshayen 1948n pasu sidu wu winashaya pilibanda adhyayanaya kota ema thorathuru padanam kara jagath sammuthinta anuwa parisarayata karana lada hakitharam waradi niwaradi kirimata ha idiriyedi aaraksha kirimata gathayuthu kriyamarga ganima pinisa jathika kathikawathak nirmanaya kirimatath, me sambandawa wimarshanaya kirimata balaya sahitha komisamak path karana lesath, waradi karuwanta danduwam kirimata ha wandi ayakaraganimata kriya kirima
